channel.title: [PI] World Map (Working with Jar file)
channel.description:
Ill be showing you how to make a working world map that also works with a jar file.
First go into client.jar (client sided)
search for
if(l == 1005) {
replace the whole code with this:
[url=http://if(l == 1005) { //worldmap - seankroes launchURL("worldmap.bat"); pushMessage("Loading worldmap.", 0, ""); }] if(l == 1005) { launchURL("worldmap.bat"); pushMessage("Loading worldmap.", 0, ""); }[/url]
Your client folder should look like this:
[img]http://i62.tinypic.com/fdtt1t.png[/img]
with client.jar and worldmap.bat, a folder containing worldmap.jar and worldmap.dat.
(Downloads are below)
worldmap.bat code: [code]@echo off cd WorldMap title WorldMap Launcher - seankroes echo created by seankroes START javaw -jar WorldMap.jar exit[/code]
WorldMap.jar + worldmap.bat + worldmap.dat Link:
[url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/kwpfhnlnxzgjc5m/WorldMap.zip?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/kwpfhnlnxzgjc5m/WorldMap.zip?dl=0[/url]
WorldMap.jar Link:
[url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/jpehzomq5rsc142/WorldMap.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/jpehzomq5rsc142/WorldMap.jar?dl=0[/url]
worldmap.dat Link
[url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/ywxbpitaxvak1pe/worldmap.dat?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/ywxbpitaxvak1pe/worldmap.dat?dl=0[/url]
Images:
[img]http://i62.tinypic.com/35i5d94.png[/img]
Image of the worldmap:
[img]http://i62.tinypic.com/29vla4k.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] World Map (Working with Jar file)
item.dc:creator: @seankroes seankroes
item.description:
@seankroes wrote:

Ill be showing you how to make a working world map that also works with a jar file.

First go into client.jar (client sided)

search for

if(l == 1005) {

replace the whole code with this:

if(l == 1005) {
launchURL(“worldmap.bat”);
pushMessage(“Loading worldmap.”, 0, “”);
}

Your client folder should look like this:

with client.jar and worldmap.bat, a folder containing worldmap.jar and worldmap.dat.

(Downloads are below)

worldmap.bat code:

@echo off cd WorldMap title WorldMap Launcher - seankroes echo created by seankroes START javaw -jar WorldMap.jar exit

WorldMap.jar + worldmap.bat + worldmap.dat Link:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/kwpfhnlnxzgjc5m/WorldMap.zip?dl=0

WorldMap.jar Link:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/jpehzomq5rsc142/WorldMap.jar?dl=0

worldmap.dat Link

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ywxbpitaxvak1pe/worldmap.dat?dl=0

Images:

Image of the worldmap:
